plot: On July 4th in New York, a distant Chinese waiter crosses paths with a graceful woman from his youth. When he finds out she's leaving, he must weigh almost certain disappointment against a chance to capture what he had lost.
title: Yes, Yesterday
plot_es: On July 4th in New York, a distant Chinese waiter crosses paths with a graceful woman from his youth. When he finds out she's leaving, he must weigh almost certain disappointment against a chance to capture what he had lost.
plot_en: On July 4th in New York, a distant Chinese waiter crosses paths with a graceful woman from his youth. When he finds out she's leaving, he must weigh almost certain disappointment against a chance to capture what he had lost.
